page.title: 06The Glympton Farms
page.content: In Glympton there is 2500 acres of farmland,and there is 500 acres of woodland on the estate.On the farmland they grow 160 acres of oil-seed-rape, 700 acres of wheat,300 acres of barley,25 acres of linseed,18 acres of lupins,100 acres of herbage-seed,100 acres of turnips,20 acres of oats,30 acres of potatoes and 80 acres of peas. 20 people are employed to work on the farm.There are 14 tractors on the farm.In Glympton there are 24 houses.No "A" roads go through Glympton.In Glympton there are 550 beef-cattle,200 cows and calves,150 fattening cattle,3 bulls,800 sheep,35 rams,500 ewes,200 sows,15 boars,250 ciglets,1735 fattening pigs.Almost all Glympton is farmland.
